com.appscend.media.renderers

Class ExoPlayerRenderer

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.appscend.media.renderers.ExoPlayerRenderer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    KRAdapter, ExoPlayerInterface.CaptionListener, ExoPlayerInterface.Id3MetadataListener, ExoPlayerInterface.Listener, IVeeplayRenderer, com.google.android.exoplayer.audio.AudioCapabilitiesReceiver.Listener

    public class ExoPlayerRenderer
extends java.lang.Object
implements ExoPlayerInterface.Listener, ExoPlayerInterface.CaptionListener, ExoPlayerInterface.Id3MetadataListener, com.google.android.exoplayer.audio.AudioCapabilitiesReceiver.Listener, IVeeplayRenderer
    An activity that plays media using ExoPlayerInterface.
